about.details:
Incorporated in 1987, Graphisads Limited provides marketing, advertising, and communications services to the government, private and public sectors.

Graphisads serves as an ad-tech communication solutions platform. The company's service list includes:

  • Media Services: Developing media plans and strategies for clients such as Air India Limited, National Buildings Construction Corporation Ltd (NBCC), Maulana Azad National Academy for Skills (MANAS), and many others.
  • Events: Providing customized event solutions including concept, design, development, and execution for all types of events. Some of the major events include Gata Rahe Mera Dil (PHDCCI music event), Ministry of Road Transport, Highways, GOI, Andhra Pradesh, Rozgar Mela, Skill India, Hunar haat, Divya Kala Mela, DTTDC Mango Festival, Yoga Day.
  • Creative Services: Planning and execution of creative ideas. This includes advertising, audio/video, print production, virtual tours, documentary production, and much more. The company has more than 35 creative minds.
  • Digital marketing: Providing digital marketing services, including search engine marketing, social media, web development, and SEO for the finance, insurance, telecom, automotive, real estate, travel, logistics, e-commerce, IT, FMCG, and education sectors.
  • Outdoor media: Providing outdoor advertising services through various options, including but not limited to traffic police stands, public utility stands, vending stands, benches, trash cans, information boards, etc.

As of June 30, 2023, Graphisads Limited has a team of 92 employees.

The company was awarded the "Best Media Agency of the Year 2013" at the Dawn Indian Realty Awards, "Excellence in Advertising" (print advertising category) by the Delhi Advertising Club, "Excellence in Advertising" (tourism category) by the Delhi Advertising Club in 2018, "Excellence in Advertising" (services category) by the Delhi Advertising Club in 2014 and "Excellence in Advertising" (outdoor media category) by the Delhi Advertising Club."

contactDetails.full_address: Graphisads Limited, 4/24 A AB House, Asaf Ali Road Near Delhi Gate, New Delhi- 110002

faqs.question: What is the Graphisads IPO?
faqs.answer:
Graphisads IPO is a SME IPO of 4812000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹53.41 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹111 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on November 30, 2023, and closes on December 5, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Graphisads IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Graphisads IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Graphisads IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Graphisads IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Graphisads IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Graphisads IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Graphisads IPO opens on November 30, 2023 and closes on December 5, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Graphisads IPO?
faqs.answer: Graphisads IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,33,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Graphisads IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Graphisads IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Graphisads IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Graphisads IPO will be done on Friday, December 8, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 12, 2023. Check the Graphisads IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Graphisads IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Graphisads IPO listing date is on Wednesday, December 13, 2023.
